languages.text: "Соломон, нас прижали, подсобишь? Только без геройства — ты мне нужен живым. Обидно было бы закончить наше знакомство, так и не узнав тебя поближе".
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."
languages.original_text: "Соломон, нас прижали, подсобишь? Только без геройства — ты мне нужен живым. Обидно было бы закончить наше знакомство, так и не узнав тебя поближе".

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know you better."
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know you better."
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."
"Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、こちらは身動きがとれない。応援を頼めるか？無茶はするな、君には生きていてほしい。せっかく知り合ったのに、もっとお互いを知る前に終わってしまったら、残念すぎるから」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、こちらは身動きがとれない。応援を頼めるか？無茶はするな、君には生きていてほしい。せっかく知り合ったのに、もっとお互いを知る前に終わってしまったら、残念すぎるから」

languages.text: "Solomorne, wir sitzen hier fest. Könnt Ihr uns helfen? Keine Heldentaten, ich brauche Euch lebendig. Es wäre doch zu schade, wenn unsere Bekanntschaft ein Ende findet, ohne dass wir uns besser kennen gelernt haben."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, wir sitzen hier fest. Könnt Ihr uns helfen? Keine Heldentaten, ich brauche Euch lebendig. Es wäre doch zu schade, wenn unsere Bekanntschaft ein Ende findet, ohne dass wir uns besser kennen gelernt haben."

languages.text: « Solomorne, nous sommes immobilisés sous les tirs ennemis. Pouvez-vous nous aider ? Ne jouez pas les héros, j'ai besoin de vous. Je regretterais de vous perdre avant même d'avoir véritablement fait votre connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, nous sommes immobilisés sous les tirs ennemis. Pouvez-vous nous aider ? Ne jouez pas les héros, j'ai besoin de vous. Je regretterais de vous perdre avant même d'avoir véritablement fait votre connaissance. »

languages.text: «Solomorne, nos han acorralado. ¿Puede ayudarnos? Nada de heroicidades; le necesito con vida. Sería una lástima poner fin a nuestra amistad sin haber tenido ocasión de conocernos mejor».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, nos han acorralado. ¿Puede ayudarnos? Nada de heroicidades; le necesito con vida. Sería una lástima poner fin a nuestra amistad sin haber tenido ocasión de conocernos mejor».

languages.text: “索罗蒙，我们被压制住了，能来帮个忙吗？别逞英雄，我要你活着。要是我们还没能互相了解你就死了，那可太可惜了。”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，我们被压制住了，能来帮个忙吗？别逞英雄，我要你活着。要是我们还没能互相了解你就死了，那可太可惜了。”

languages.text: "Solomorne, burada kıstırıldık. Yardım edebilir misin? Kahramanlığa kalkışma, sana sağ ihtiyacım var. Birbirimizi daha yakından tanıyamadan tanışıklığımızın sona ermesini istemem."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, we are pinned down. Can you help? No heroics — I need you alive. It would be a shame to end our acquaintance without first getting to know each other better."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, burada kıstırıldık. Yardım edebilir misin? Kahramanlığa kalkışma, sana sağ ihtiyacım var. Birbirimizi daha yakından tanıyamadan tanışıklığımızın sona ermesini istemem."
